events.message: The applicant has formally submitted the mortgage loan application for their new home purchase. All initial forms are completed and uploaded.
The loan application was categorised as a mortgage loan based on property purchase intent and collateral details provided by the applicant.
Loan officer Sarah Mitchell has been assigned to manage the mortgage application process and provide assistance to the client.
Initial review completed to verify completeness of the mortgage application and assess basic applicant eligibility criteria.
Additional documents were requested from the applicant, including property appraisal report and proof of income for the mortgage evaluation.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including the updated appraisal report and revised bank statements for the mortgage loan.
Credit check was completed and revealed a strong credit history with a high score, positively impacting the mortgage application status.
Risk assessment was conducted on the mortgage application taking into account property value, market trends, and applicant financial stability.
A mortgage loan offer was presented to the applicant outlining the terms, interest rate, loan amount, and repayment schedule.
The applicant provided feedback on the mortgage offer, requesting clarification on certain clauses and slightly different payment options.
The mortgage loan application was escalated to the senior underwriting team for further review due to the applicant's special request.
The mortgage loan application was approved after thorough reviews, confirming eligibility and agreeing to terms as modified.
Funds for the mortgage loan were disbursed successfully to the applicant's designated escrow account for property purchase completion.
Follow-up made with the borrower to confirm receipt of funds and provide support for any questions regarding the mortgage repayment.
The mortgage loan application file has been officially closed after successful funding and satisfactory post-approval engagement.
